research: Dr. Rashidul has authored several papers on ischemic heart disease management in low-resource settings, including a 2021 study on secondary prevention adherence in rural Bangladesh.
experience_details: Over a 12-year clinical career Dr. Rashidul has worked in tertiary cardiac centers and regional hospitals, managing acute coronary syndrome, heart failure clinics and interventional follow-ups. He regularly supervises cardiology trainees and runs community screening camps for hypertension and diabetes.
current_hospital: National Heart Foundation Hospital & Research Institute, Dhaka

research: Her recent research includes a multi-center audit of caesarean section indications and a 2022 paper on improving antenatal care uptake in suburban clinics.
experience_details: Dr. Nazmun has nine years of experience in maternal health, antenatal risk management and operative obstetrics. She has led childbirth education programs, trained midwives in emergency obstetric care, and provides family planning and high-risk pregnancy consultations.

research: Dr. Salahuddin has contributed to research on fracture fixation techniques and a 2019 case series on diabetic foot complications requiring orthopedic intervention.
experience_details: With fifteen years in orthopedics, he has extensive experience in trauma care, joint replacement surgeries and arthroscopic procedures. He regularly conducts training workshops on fracture management and postoperative rehabilitation protocols.

research: Her work includes a 2020 observational study on malnutrition screening tools and an article on vaccine hesitancy factors among urban parents.
experience_details: Dr. Farhana provides outpatient and inpatient pediatric care with a focus on nutrition, growth monitoring and infectious diseases. She has coordinated childhood immunization drives and mentors junior pediatric residents.

research: Dr. Samiul has published on triage protocols and emergency response times, including a 2021 evaluation of pre-hospital care pathways in his region.
experience_details: Over a decade in emergency departments, he manages trauma, acute medical emergencies and disaster response coordination. He leads basic and advanced life support training and has helped set up emergency triage systems for district hospitals.
current_hospital: Dhaka Medical College Hospital - Emergency Department

research: Her research focuses on diabetes care; notable works include a 2022 pilot on community-based diabetes education and glycaemic control outcomes.
experience_details: Dr. Laila manages complex endocrine disorders including diabetes, thyroid disease and metabolic syndrome. She runs multidisciplinary clinics for lifestyle modification and supervises insulin initiation programs for primary-care physicians.

research: Dr. Towhidul has authored studies on stroke rehabilitation outcomes and a 2020 review on epilepsy management in adults.
experience_details: With eleven years of practice in neurology, he treats stroke, epilepsy, neuromuscular and movement disorders. He participates in stroke awareness campaigns and collaborates with rehabilitation teams to optimise patient recovery.
current_hospital: Chittagong Medical College Hospital - Neurology Unit

research: Her publications include analyses of postoperative infection rates and a 2018 study on optimizing laparoscopic procedures in district hospitals.
experience_details: Dr. Mahbuba has broad surgical experience including minimally invasive surgery, emergency laparotomies and hernia repairs. She teaches surgical technique courses and supports surgical outreach camps in rural areas.

research: Dr. Imran has a special interest in hepatitis management and has contributed to local guideline development for chronic liver disease screening.
experience_details: In six years of gastroenterology practice he manages endoscopic procedures, chronic liver disease clinics and dyspepsia services. He is active in community education programs on viral hepatitis prevention.

research: Her recent case reports cover tropical dermatology presentations and a 2023 survey on acne treatment adherence among adolescents.
experience_details: Dr. Shampa treats a wide range of skin conditions including eczema, acne and infectious dermatology. She organises patient education sessions on skin care and supervises minor dermatologic procedures.
current_hospital: Comilla Medical College Hospital - Dermatology Unit

research: Dr. Ehsanul has published on COPD management strategies and participated in a national audit of asthma control in primary care settings.
experience_details: With 14 years specialising in respiratory medicine, he manages chronic airway diseases, tuberculosis follow-up and sleep-disordered breathing clinics. He is involved in pulmonary rehabilitation program development for community hospitals.
current_hospital: National Institute of Diseases of the Chest and Hospital (NIDCH), Dhaka

research: Her academic interests include adolescent mental health and community-based interventions; she co-authored a 2022 review on reducing stigma in help-seeking.
experience_details: Dr. Nusrat provides outpatient psychiatric care for mood, anxiety and psychotic disorders, and conducts psychotherapy sessions. She leads mental health awareness workshops for schools and trains primary-care staff in basic mental health screening.
current_hospital: Khulna Medical College Hospital - Psychiatry Department
